ingredients.item: 1 x 45g Sacla’ Classic Basil Pesto Pots
400g can essential Waitrose Chick Peas, drained and rinsed
280g jar Cooks’ Ingredients Chargrilled Peppers In Olive Oil, drained and very roughly chopped

instructions.step: Cook the pasta in a large pan of boiling water for 10–12 minutes until tender.
Meanwhile, gently cook the pancetta in a small non-stick frying pan for 5 minutes until crisp and lightly browned.
Drain the pasta and cool under running water. Toss with the pancetta, pesto, chick peas and peppers. Scatter over the basil leaves and a good grinding of black pepper to serve.
